• 一、用户

    1.1、用户登录注册

    • 1.1.1、用户登录接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/authUser.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "phone": "13812345678",
    "password": "123456"
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "验证成功",
    "data": {
        "address": "",
        "age": 26,
        "birthday": "1989-02-14",
        "constellation": "水瓶座",
        "emotionalState": "单身",
        "grade": "",
        "headUrl": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000001/userLogo107962492089026413612012656425702529.jpg",
        "hometown": "",
        "job": "",
        "picList": [],
        "registerTime": 1443525257492,
        "school": "18713",
        "schoolName": "河南牧业经济学院",
        "sex": "男",
        "signInfo": "",
        "twodimensioncode": "http://www.schoolike.com/pic/10000001/userId.jpg",
        "userId": 10000001,
        "userName": "Kevin",
        "userType": "market"
    },
    "sessionid": "EBAD39EE3375A509E5667626C1A61CF0"
}

    • 1.1.2、用户注册接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/registerUser.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "phone": "13812345678",
    "password": "123456",
    "identifyingCode": 123456
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "用户注册成功",
    "data": {
        "address": "",
        "age": 0,
        "birthday": "",
        "constellation": "",
        "emotionalState": "",
        "grade": "",
        "headUrl": "",
        "hometown": "",
        "job": "",
        "picList": [],
        "registerTime": 1447206981223,
        "school": "",
        "schoolName": "",
        "sex": "",
        "signInfo": "",
        "twodimensioncode": "http://www.schoolike.com/pic/10000076/userId.jpg",
        "userId": 10000076,
        "userName": "",
        "userType": "common"
    },
    "sessionid": "EBAD39EE3375A509E5667626C1A61CF0"
}

    • 1.1.3、找回密码接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/findbackPSD.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "phone": "13812345678",
    "password": "123456",
    "identifyingCode": 673012
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "用户密码找回成功",
    "data": {
        "address": "",
        "age": 26,
        "birthday": "1989-02-14",
        "constellation": "水瓶座",
        "emotionalState": "单身",
        "grade": "",
        "headUrl": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000001/userLogo107962492089026413612012656425702529.jpg",
        "hometown": "",
        "job": "",
        "picList": [],
        "registerTime": 1443525257492,
        "school": "18713",
        "schoolName": "河南牧业经济学院",
        "sex": "男",
        "signInfo": "",
        "twodimensioncode": "http://www.schoolike.com/pic/10000001/userId.jpg",
        "userId": 10000001,
        "userName": "Kevin",
        "userType": "market"
    },
    "sessionid": "78CAEC99F633472B2C4E6255B1E850E8"
}

    • 1.1.4、发送验证码（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/sendIdentifyingCode.action
      JSON参数: type可以为findbackpsd和register，分别是忘记密码验证码和注册验证码
      {
    "phone": "13812345678",
    "type": "register"
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "发送成功",
    "data": {
        "identifyingCode": 673012
    }
}

    • 1.1.5、更新手机号码接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/updatePhone.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "phone": "13812345678",
    "userId": 10000001
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "操作成功",
    "data": []
}

    • 1.1.6、修改密码接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/auth/updatePassword.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "oldPassword": "123456",
    "newPassword": "admin",
    "userId": 10000001
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "你的密码修改成功",
    "data": []
}

    1.2、我的用户资料

    • 1.2.1、获取我的信息详情接口（GET）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/profile/getMyProfile/{userId}.action
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "data": {
        "address": "河南省郑州市金水区花园路街道",
        "age": 21,
        "birthday": "1994-10-13",
        "constellation": "天秤座",
        "emotionalState": "",
        "grade": "13级",
        "headUrl": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000006/userLogo32937179772541971177430283663834.jpg",
        "hometown": "",
        "job": "",
        "picList": [],
        "registerTime": 1443530087888,
        "school": "18713",
        "schoolName": "河南牧业经济学院",
        "sex": "",
        "signInfo": "这是一个测试签名",
        "twodimensioncode": "http://www.schoolike.com/pic/10000006/userId.jpg",
        "userId": 10000006,
        "userName": "",
        "userType": "shop"
    }
}

    • 1.2.2、获取用户详细个人信息接口（GET）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/profile/getUserProfile/{userId}.action
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "data": {
        "address": "河南省郑州市金水区花园路街道",
        "age": 21,
        "birthday": "1994-10-13",
        "constellation": "天秤座",
        "emotionalState": "",
        "grade": "13级",
        "headUrl": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000006/userLogo32937179772541971177430283663834.jpg",

        "school": "18713",

        "userId": 10000006,
        "userName": "",
        "userType": "shop"
    }
}

    • 1.2.3、添加个人详细信息接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/profile/updateUserBase.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "userId": 10000006,
    "key": "signInfo",
    "value": "这是一个测试签名"
}

key - value :
    "address": "苏州",
    "birthday": "2014-06-08",
    "emotionalState": "单身",
    "grade": "1",
    "hometown": "苏州",
    "job": "1",
    "schoolName": "苏州大学",
    "sex": "男",
    "signInfo": "test1",
    "userId": 10000001,
    "userName": "test1"
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "操作成功",
    "data": []
}

    • 1.2.6、上传用户logo图像（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/profile/updateUserLogo.action
      使用说明:
      有一个参数userId，还有一个就是图片文件
下面是java httpclient的代码示例，IOS的自己参考
HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/profile/updateUserLogo.action");
File targetFile = new File("d:\\clipboard.png");//需要上传的文件的地址
Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile), new StringPart("userId", 10000001+"")};//userId是普通参数为int类型
filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
	System.out.println(filePost.getResponseBodyAsString());
} else {
	System.out.println("上传失败");
}
      JSON返回:
      {"result":1}

    • 1.2.7、添加用户照片接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/pic/addUserPics.action
      JSON参数:
      有一个参数userId，还有一个就是图片文件，可以为多个文件
下面是java httpclient的代码示例，IOS的自己参考

HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/pic/addUserPics.action");
File targetFile = new File("d:\\clipboard.png");//需要上传的文件的地址
Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile), new StringPart("userId", 10000001+"")};//userId是普通参数为int类型
filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
	System.out.println(filePost.getResponseBodyAsString());
} else {
	System.out.println("上传失败");
}
      JSON返回:
      {"result":1}

    • 1.2.8、删除用户照片接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/info/pic/deleteUserPic.action
      JSON参数:
      {
    "userId": 10000006,
    "pic": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000006/userPic33715921696015160521045364372830.jpg"
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "操作成功",
    "data": []
}

    1.3、用户IM

    • 1.3.1、加载用户所有粉丝接口（GET）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/im/roster/queryFollowersInfo/{userId}.action
      描述:
      获取用户userId为10000001的所有好友信息
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "data": [
        {
            "logo": "http://192.168.0.108/image/1.jpg",
            "sex": "男",
            "signInfo": "",
            "userId": 10000002,
            "userName": "test2"
        }
    ]
}

    • 1.3.2、获取用户关注列表接口（GET）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/im/roster/getMyFollowUsers/{userId}.action
      JSON参数:
      hostUserId查看自己的好友userId的信息
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "查询成功",
    "data": [
        {
            "friend": false,
            "sex": false,
            "signInfo": "",
            "spell": "S",
            "userId": 10000,
            "userLogo": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/10000/userLogo113990098898521301122812650921397789.jpg",
            "userName": "SchooLike",
            "userType": "admin"
        }
    ]
}

    • 1.3.3、添加好友接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/im/roster/addRoster.action
      JSON参数://hostUserId加userId为好友
      {
    "hostUserId": 10000001,
    "userId": 10000002
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "操作成功",
    "data": []
}

    • 1.3.4、接受好友添加请求接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/im/addChatPic.action
      JSON参数:
      HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://127.0.0.1:8080/schoolike/user/im/addChatPic.action");
File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile)};//userId是普通参数为int类型
filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
	return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
} else {
	System.out.println("上传失败");
}
return null;
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "图片上传成功",
    "data": {
        "picUrl": "http://www.schoolike.com//pic/chat/chatpic33717070491315064739569823258956.png"
    }
}

    • 1.3.5、删除好友接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/user/im/roster/deleteRoster.action
      JSON参数: //hostUserId删除好友userId
      {
    "hostUserId": 10000001,
    "userId": 10000002
}
      JSON返回:
      {"result":1}

    二、社交

    • 2.0 上报位置信息（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/invitation/uploadUserLocation.action
      JSON参数:
      {
	"userId":10000002,
	"lng":120.64441,
	"lat":31.309873
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "操作成功"
}

    2.1 约会

    • 2.1.1 发布约会接口（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/invitation/publishInvitation.action
      JSON参数:
      import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import net.sf.json.JSONObject;

	public static String test() throws Exception{
		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		File targetFile1 = new File("d:/clipboard1.png");
		File targetFile2 = new File("d:/clipboard2.png");
		
		JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
		json.put("userId", 10000001);
		json.put("title", "测试发布约会");
		json.put("address", "苏州大学相门新村");
		json.put("inviterType", "帅哥");
		json.put("invitationType", "求请客");
		json.put("invitationDescription", "新开一家饺子馆，味道据说很好");
		json.put("lng", 120.64441);
		json.put("lat", 31.309873);

		Part [] parts = {new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile1.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile2.getName(), targetFile),
				new StringPart("param", json.toString(), "utf-8")};
	
		
		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/invitation/publishInvitation.action");
		//filePost.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "text/html;charset=utf-8");
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "约会发布成功",
    "data" : {
        "invitationId" : "invId42046652143673436345912364533438683"
    }
}

    2.1.4 邀约操作

    2.1.4.1 约会图片
    • 2.1.4.1.1 约会添加图片（POST）
      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/invitation/addInvitationPic.action
      JSON参数:
      import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.JSONValue;

	public static String test() throws Exception{
		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/invitation/addInvitationPic.action");
		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile), new StringPart("userId", "10000002"), new StringPart("invitationId","invId42046652143673436345912364533438683")};//userId是普通参数为int类型
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "图片上传成功",
    "data" : {
        "picUrl" : "http://116.255.139.70/image/10000002/invitationPic42046689646617927537592482287673986.png",
        "picId" : "invPic42046689648485913371989798057192500"
    }
}

    2.2 新主张

    • 2.2.1 发布新主张（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/newProposal/addNewProposal.action
      JSON参数:
      import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import net.sf.json.JSONObject;

	public static String test() throws Exception{

		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		File targetFile1 = new File("d:/clipboard1.png");
		File targetFile2 = new File("d:/clipboard2.png");
		
		JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
		json.put("userId", 10000002);
		json.put("content", "我发布了一张测试新主张");

		Part [] parts = {new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile1.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile2.getName(), targetFile),
				new StringPart("param", json.toString(), "utf-8")};

		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/newProposal/addNewProposal.action");
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "新主张发布成功",
    "data" : {
        "newProposalId" : "newId42046708491618574325411084071343586"
    }
}

    2.2.3 新主张操作

      {
	"newProposalId":"newId42046708491618574325411084071343586",
	"userId":10000002
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "操作成功"
}
    2.2.3.2 删除新主张
    • 2.2.3.2.1 删除新主张接口（POST）

    "msg" : "操作成功"
}

      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/newProposal/queryNewProposalPraises/{newProposalId}.action
      JSON参数:
      newProposalId为新主张的ID
      JSON返回:

    "msg" : "查询新主张点赞信息成功",

            "emotionalState" : "非单身",

    • 2.3.2 发布咸鱼（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/publishSaltedFish.action
      JSON参数:
      import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import net.sf.json.JSONObject;

	public static String test() throws Exception{

		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		File targetFile1 = new File("d:/clipboard1.png");
		File targetFile2 = new File("d:/clipboard2.png");
		
		JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
		json.put("userId", 10000002);
		json.put("title", "测试发布咸鱼");
		json.put("address","苏州大学相门新村");
		json.put("description","2015年考研复习资料一整套");
		json.put("type","book");
		json.put("tel","13500001111");
		json.put("price",380);
		json.put("discount",65);

		Part [] parts = {new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile1.getName(), targetFile),
				new FilePart(targetFile2.getName(), targetFile),
				new StringPart("param", json.toString(), "utf-8")};

		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/publishSaltedFish.action");
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "咸鱼发布成功",
    "data" : {
        "saltedFishId" : "fishId42046732195917927776741826455988489"
    }
}

    • 2.3.3 添加咸鱼信息（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/addSaltedFish.action
      JSON参数:
      {
	"userId":10000002,
	"title":"测试发布咸鱼",
	"address":"苏州大学相门新村",
	"description":"2015年考研复习资料一整套",
	"type":"book",
	"tel":"13500001111",
	"price":380,
	"discount":65	
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "咸鱼发布成功",
    "data" : {
        "saltedFishId" : "fishId42046733856096551643287817773067229"
    }
}

    2.3.5 咸鱼操作

    2.3.5.1 删除咸鱼
    • 2.3.5.1.1 删除咸鱼（POST）
      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/deleteSaltedFish.action
      JSON参数:
      {
	"saltedFishId":"fishId42046741984587667583999195881379005"
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "操作成功"
}
    2.3.5.2 图片
    • 2.3.5.2.1 添加咸鱼图片（POST）
      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/addSaltedFishPic.action
      JSON参数:
      import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.JSONValue;

	public static String test() throws Exception{
		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/addSaltedFishPic.action");
		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile), new StringPart("userId", "10000002"), new StringPart("saltedFishId","fishId42046733856096551643287817773067229")};//userId是普通参数为int类型
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "图片上传成功",
    "data" : {
        "picUrl" : "http://116.255.139.70/image/10000002/saltedFishPic42046746363424785432992954298521423.png",
        "picId" : "fishPic42046746365247861956216849300311281"
    }
}
    • 2.3.5.2.2 查看邀约照片列表接口（GET）
      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/community/saltedFish/querySaltedFishPics/{saltedFishId}.action
      JSON参数:
      saltedFishId为咸鱼的ID
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "查询成功",
    "data" : ["http://116.255.139.70/image/10000002/saltedFishPic42046746363424785432992954298521423.png"]
}
    • 2.3.5.2.3 咸鱼删除图片（POST）

	"picUrl":"http://116.255.139.70/image/10000002/saltedFishPic42046746363424785432992954298521423.png"
}

    3.3 收藏夹

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/shop/favorite/addFavoriteInfo.action

      {
  "userId":10000001,

    3.5 订单

    • 3.5.1、提交订单（POST）

      URL地址:
      http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/shop/order/addOrder.action
      JSON参数:
      {
  "userId":10000001,
  "shopId":"shop00001",
  "addressId":"userAddress88692536388892532584994343421603",
  "expressWayId":"expway100001",//物流方式
  "discount":35.8,
  "buyerMsg":"红色大号款",
  "goodsInfo":[
  	{
  		"gcolor":"红色",
  		"gsize":"39",
  		"goodsId":"goods100001",
  		"num":2
  	},{
  		"gcolor":"红色",
  		"gsize":"39",
  		"goodsId":"goods100001",
  		"num":3
  	}
  ]
}
      JSON返回:
      {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "支付成功",
    "data" : {
        "orderId" : "myOrder3605473409257621490138690405103007"
    }
}

      {
    "result": 1,
    "msg": "操作成功",
    "data":[
		{
			"id":id,
			"status":1,//等待发货
			"allprice":allprice,
			"payprice":payprice,
			"createTime":createTime,
			"seller":seller,
			"express":express,
			"sellerName":sellerName,
			"sellerPhone":sellerPhone,
			"codeUrl":codeUrl
		},{
			"id":id,
			"status":2,//已发货待收货
			"allprice":allprice,
			"payprice":payprice,
			"createTime":createTime,
			"seller":seller,
			"express":express,
			"sellerName":sellerName,
			"sellerPhone":sellerPhone,
			"codeUrl":codeUrl
		}
	]
}

3.8.5 实名认证

  • 3.8.5.1、实名认证（POST）
    URL地址:
    http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/pay/wallet/addRealNameAuthentication.action
    JSON参数:
    import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpStatus;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.Part;
import org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.StringPart;
import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.JSONValue;

	public static String test() throws Exception{
		HttpClient client = new HttpClient();
		PostMethod filePost = new PostMethod("http://${server}:${port}/schoolike/pay/wallet/addRealNameAuthentication.action");
		File targetFile = new File("d:/clipboard.png");
		Part[] parts = { new FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile), new StringPart("userId", "${userId}"), new StringPart("name","毛红永","utf-8"),new StringPart("type","身份证","utf-8"),new StringPart("id","322738384849494848")};//userId是普通参数为int类型
		filePost.setRequestEntity(new MultipartRequestEntity(parts, filePost.getParams()));
		client.getHttpConnectionManager().getParams().setConnectionTimeout(5000);
		int status = client.executeMethod(filePost);
		if (status == HttpStatus.SC_OK) {
			return filePost.getResponseBodyAsString();
		} else {
			System.out.println("上传失败");
		}
		return null;
	}

	test();
    JSON返回:
    {
    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "上传实名认证信息成功"
}
  • 3.8.5.2、获取实名认证信息（GET）
    URL地址:
    http://116.255.139.70:8080/schoolike/pay/wallet/getRealNameAuthentication/{userId}.action
    JSON参数:
    userId为用户ID
    JSON返回:

    "result" : 1,
    "msg" : "查询成功",
    "data" : {
        "certificateId" : "322738384849494848",
        "certificateType" : "身份证",
        "name" : "毛红永",
        "url" : "http://116.255.139.70/image/10000001/realAuthPic36084952056384608709312035324330996.png",
        "userId" : 10000001,
        "verified" : false
    }
}
